metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41887 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messy data. Prior to version 3.7.5, a remote code execution vulnerability allows any unauthenticated user to execute code on the server. Version 3.7.5 has a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
